blogs.title: My first blog
blogs.body: As in the title. I just want to tell you that doing these amazing things using React is fun and is easier than I used to think. Im glad that I started tis journey.
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: Blog is fun
blogs.body: Blog is fun.You can basicly write some shit and no one take care about it. I an write some racist stuff and be cool with it.
blogs.author: yoshi

blogs.title: It`s ame, Mario!
blogs.body: It`s ame, Mario! Everyone knows that, but not everyone played Super Mario Bros... This is ridiculous
